about_the_game:
Note: Save files cannot be used in the demo. Exiting to the main menu will restart the demo from the beginning.

The nightmare is back, and bigger than ever. Return to the realm of monsters in this Chapter 1 demo of Noxia Somnia: Ultimate Edition, a major content update coming soon for Noxia Somnia.

  • Major visual improvements have been made to the game's lighting, set dressing, and monster designs.

  • Try your best to survive in the new Ultimate Nightmare game mode, featuring exclusive new enemies, abilities, and souls.

  • We've made your next play through better than ever with quality of life adjustments across the board, including both UI and UX improvements.

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence and horror elements
Mentions of suicidal thoughts
